example.title: Attach Data To TreeNode
example.metakeywords: php treeview, php tree view, php tree, ajax treeview, php ajax treeview, treeview drag and drop, php treeview mysql, kooltreeview
example.metadescription: KoolTreeView is the excellent treeview control for PHP, combining highly-efficient rendering and AJAX Load on Demand support for superior performance.
example.description:
KoolTreeView supports adding data to a tree node from server-side with addData() method. Those added data can be retrieved easily at client-side with getData() function of treenode.

Above example show you:

  • - How to add author, image, price information to node.
  • - How to get those information to display at client-side.
